tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt: 3rd qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh:
Was a regular on the Korean Golf Tour from 2009-12 and was one of the leading money-winners on that circuit. Has also played selected events on the Japan Golf Tour as well as on the European Tour and Asian Tours. 

2012: Competed on the Korean Golf Tour as well as on both the Asian Tour and OneAsia Tour...Finished fifth on the Korean Golf Tour money list...Best finish on the OneAsia Tour was a second place at the Kolon Korea Open...Was also fourth at the CJ Invitational hosted by K.J. Choi on the Asian Tour...Finished T87 at the PGA TOUR National Qualifying Tournament. 

2011: Qualified for the U.S. Open in at Congressional but missed the cut. 

2010: Led the Korean Golf Tour in earnings...Won the GS Caltex Maekyung Open on the OneAsia Tour and was second that year at the SK Telecom Open...Added a T7 at the Kolon 53rd Korea Open in September. 

2009: Finished fourth on the final Korean Golf Tour money list. 

2008: Enjoyed a solid performance at the GS Caltex Maekyung Open, shooting a final-round 68 to sneak into the top-10 (T10).

tourBios.intlVics: (1): 2010 GS Caltex Maekyung Open [OneAsia]. 2012 Munsingwear Match Play Championship [Kor].
tourBios.carHigh: Has played on the Korean Tour, Asian Tour and OneAsia Tour. 2012: Won the Munsingwear Match Play Championship on the Korean Tour. 2010: Won his first OneAsia title, at the 29th GS Caltex Maekyung Open and finished runner up on the Order of Merit.
tourBios.personal: Favorite team is the Samsung baseball team...Follows the University of Michigan football team...Dream foursome would include Rickie Fowler, Ryo Ishikawa and Rory McIlroy...Would like to switch places for a day with Tiger Woods...Supports the K.J. Choi Foundation.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T13th in 2013 at the Panama Claro Championship.
